metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Waiting Room lets you direct users to a custom-branded virtual 'waiting room' during traffic surges, improving their experience while they wait.

relatedBlades.entryTitle: Waiting Room Product Page - Personalized Hero
relatedBlades.personalisedContentName: Waiting Room Product Page - Personalized Hero

personalisedEntries.entryTitle: Personalized Hero - Waiting Room - Not Biz or Ent Customer

segmentEntry.title: Waiting Room
segmentEntry.subtitle: Protect application access during peak traffic with a virtual queue
segmentEntry.copy:
Sudden increases in traffic can overwhelm your applications and infrastructure, leading to slow performance or complete disruption to your online presence.

Cloudflare Waiting Room allows organizations to route excess users to a custom-branded waiting room, helping preserve customer experience and protect origin servers from being overwhelmed with requests.

[*Included with Business and Enterprise plans](https://developers.cloudflare.com/waiting-room/about/plans)
segmentEntry.buttonText1: Upgrade to Business Plan to get Waiting Room
segmentEntry.buttonText1LoggedIn: Upgrade to Business Plan to get Waiting Room
segmentEntry.buttonText2LoggedIn: Need more than one Waiting Room?
segmentEntry.leftLink:
Need more than one Waiting Room? [Talk to an Expert](https://linkhere.com)

Learn how Project Fair Shot is helping distribute the COVID-19 vaccine [Learn More](https://www.cloudflare.com/fair-shot)
segmentEntry.leftLinkLoggedIn: Learn how Project Fair Shot is helping distribute the COVID-19 vaccine [Learn More](https://www.cloudflare.com/fair-shot)

controlEntry.title: Cloudflare Waiting Room
controlEntry.subtitle: A virtual waiting room to manage peak traffic
controlEntry.copy:
Sudden increases in traffic can overwhelm your applications and infrastructure, leading to slow performance or complete disruption to your online presence.

Cloudflare Waiting Room allows organizations to route excess users to a custom-branded waiting room, helping preserve customer experience and protect origin servers from being overwhelmed with requests.
controlEntry.buttonText2LoggedIn: Need more than one Waiting Room?

relatedBlades.title: Stay online, provide an excellent customer experience, and protect your application during traffic surges

features.title: Reduce cart abandonment rate
features.description: Ensure that your online transactions are not impacted by downtime or slow application performance during peak traffic hours.

features.title: Deliver a consistent brand experience
features.description: Waiting room acts as an extension of your brand, ensuring that users get a seamless online experience even while waiting.

features.title: Reduce your infrastructure costs
features.description: Eliminate costs associated with maintaining additional servers and purchasing extra bandwidth to serve peak traffic.

relatedBlades.title: Application access protection when you need it most

relatedBlades.quote: "If we are hosting a game that is very popular, and we end up getting hundreds of thousands more users than anticipated, we know that our infrastructure will have time to scale, thanks to Cloudflare Waiting Room."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Our relationship with Cloudflare went from 'Let's try Waiting Room' to 'Unless you have this, we're not going live with that public facing site.' Our solution is all about patient relationship management, so, as we expand with hospitals, it is going to be part of our default recommendation to them and how they deal with their security stance for opening up their surfaces to the community."

"Typically, we'll hit about 70% utilization across our web servers and database. With Cloudflare Waiting Room's queue enabled, we were letting 200 visitors through at a time, and we saw there's no noticeable spike. It was only at 10% of capacity...which is really good to see."

"Cloudflare supports KVT in the implementation of the vaccine campaign against SARS-CoV 2 for the Free State of Thuringia in Germany. With the Fair Shot project and its CDN and Waiting Room solutions, the security and availability of processes are guaranteed on the basis of data protection compliant services."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Statutory Health Organization of the German State of Thuringia

imageAssetFile.altText: Image of blue stylized rectangle followed by a spacer and a website address.
imageAssetFile.title: KVT logo

quoteCarousel.quote: Classmethod partners with Cloudflare to provide free Waiting Room services for vaccine registration sites across 317 cities nationwide.

imageAssetFile.altText: Logo for Classmethod featuring a stylized group of multi-colored rectangles organized in a flower-like shape.
imageAssetFile.title: Classmethod logo

relatedBlades.title: Keep wait times low
relatedBlades.copy: Waiting Room keeps wait times low by dynamically managing traffic. As soon as a user leaves an application or their cookie expires, a new user is let in.

imageAssetFile.altText: Illustration depicting users entering an application from the waiting room.
imageAssetFile.title: Keep Wait Times Low

relatedBlades.title: Manage queues your way
relatedBlades.copy: Set activation thresholds based on incoming rate of traffic or total active users. Admit queued visitors using multiple queuing options — first-in-first-out, random, or lottery.

relatedBlades.title: Tailor your waiting room to your brand
relatedBlades.copy: Customize your Waiting Room experience with custom HTML and CSS, multiple languages, and more branding options. Getting set up is extremely easy and you have complete control.

relatedBlades.title: Get started in minutes
relatedBlades.copy: All it takes to get set up is filling out five fields in the Cloudflare dashboard or via API. No coding, JavaScript tags, or off cycle deployments that can introduce bugs required.

features.title: Highly accurate wait times
features.description: Waiting Room continually syncs data across global points of presence in seconds so wait times are always up to date

features.title: Never ask a user to re-queue
features.description: Waiting Room remembers users for as long as their cookie is valid, so they do not lose their place in line

features.title: Granular control
features.description: Dictate your own custom application thresholds, session duration limit, queueing methods, and more

features.title: Announcement blog
features.description: Learn more about how Waiting Room enables COVID-19 vaccine distribution with Project Fairshot.

features.title: Frequently asked questions
features.description: Take a look at Cloudflare Help Center for answers to commonly asked questions about Waiting Room.

features.title: Developer documentation
features.description: Find detailed information about and instructions for configuring and using Waiting Room.

features.title: API documentation
features.description: Get more information about managing waiting rooms with the Cloudflare API.

features.title: Waiting Room overview
features.description: Download this 2-pager for an overview of the Cloudflare Waiting Room's key features.

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare Waiting Room helped us protect our infrastructure from over-burdening during unexpected spikes in traffic. It was easy to set up a waiting room and add our company branding to it, helping us deliver a smooth customer experience."

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
